fields.description: I understand and accept that the Center has the right to approve or reject my registration application at any point in time.
fields.label: Accept Registration

fields.description: The information collected with this questionnaire will be used by Swissmed Health for medical services and practices. Your personal data and information will remain with Swissmed Health for us to provide you with medical services and other related services both at the center and also potentially to other health centers. This may require that your personal data including medical records to be shared with other medical service providers for referral purposes as well as other legal and procedural purposes of the center.
fields.label: Your personal information

fields.description: I confirm that to the best of my knowledge the information that I have given on this registration form/questionnaire is accurate. Additionally, I understand that it is my responsibility to inform and update the Center as to any changes to my personal data and information.
fields.label: Accept Personal Data

fields.description: I hereby give my consent to the Center to communicate with me via phone, email or other means for updates as to new medical programs, upcoming lectures and conferences as well as Center news.
fields.label: Accept Communication

fields.description:
By participating in Swissmed Health's Hormonal Optimization Program, the member acknowledges and voluntarily consents to hormone levels being adjusted beyond normal health and optimization parameters at their own request.
The member understands and accepts that such adjustments may carry increased risks, including but not limited to potential health complications, side effects, or adverse outcomes.
The member expressly waives any claims against Swissmed Health, its physicians, staff, and affiliated entities for any liability, harm, or damages arising from hormone adjustments beyond standard recommended health levels.
The member agrees that Swissmed Health shall not be held responsible for any negative health impacts resulting from member-initiated requests for hormone levels outside of normal clinical guidelines.
fields.label: Do you understand that hormonal optimization therapy is a personalized treatment plan and may not be suitable for everyone?

fields.description: I agree to the processing of my personal data in accordance with the GDPR Policy for the purposes of  registration and communication.
fields.label: Agree to GDPR-compliant data processing for registration & communication.

fields.description: I confirm that the personal, medical, and contact information I have provided is true and complete to the best  of my knowledge.I understand it is my responsibility to inform and update the Center as to any changes to my  personal data and info.
fields.label: Confirm my info is accurate & complete.

fields.description: I consent to receive informational and promotional communications from the medical center, including health  education materials, updates on medical programs and services, invitations to events, lectures or workshops, and  newsletters (optional)
fields.label: Consent to health updates, promos & event invites from med center (optional)
